title: Xayah and Rakan icon
body: I used my last refund to have enough IP to buy my girlfriend Rakan during the promotion to get the icon, and she bought me Xayah, but we never got the icon... They said to wait because it would arrive in the next 14 days, but it never came. Can anybody help us?

replies.body: Thank you! We really appreciate it!
No worries! Both of you check for that icon now ^_^!
